colour-me-desc: Change the colour of your role, if configured!
hexcode-desc: An RGB hex code for the colour you want to set.
you-dont-have-any-coloured-roles:
You don't have any coloured roles!
To use this command you need a role with a colour already set in Discord, that has colour-me enabled by an admin.
your-highest-coloured-role-not-enabled:
Your highest coloured role is not enabled for colour-me!
An admin needs to use `/colour-role add` for <@&{{roleid}}>
no-permission:
I don't have permission to access your top coloured role!
Make sure my top role is above <@&{{roleid}}>!
okay-i-changed-random: Okay, I changed the colour of <@&{{roleid}}> to a random colour!
not-a-hex-code: That doesn't look like a hex code!
invalid-hex-code: The given hex code is invalid!
okay-i-changed-specific: Okay, I changed the colour of <@&{{roleid}}> to `{{colour}}`!
colour-role-desc: Manage the colour role list for this server!
add-desc: Add a colour role to the allowed list
remove-desc: Remove a colour from the allowed list
role-list-desc: Show all the configured colour roles
role-already-in-list: The role <@&{{roleid}}> is already in the colour role list!
role-added-to-list: I've added <@&{{roleid}}> to the colour role list!
role-removed-from-list: I've removed <@&{{roleid}}> from the colour role list!
role-not-in-list: The role <@&{{roleid}}> wasn't on the colour role list!
role-list-empty:
There are no configured colour roles for this server.
Add some with `/colour-role add`!
role-list-header: These are all the configured roles.
about-desc: See how to use the bot!
about-text:
Colour me! is a bot that allows server admins to give users the ability to change the colour of their own assigned colour roles!

**Server admin commands**:
```/colour-role add <role>`:
Add a role to the list of roles that are allowed to change their own colour!

`/colour-role remove <role>`:
Remove a role previously added to the list of allowed roles!

`/colour-role list`:
See the current list of roles!

All of these require the `Manage Roles` permission.
Make sure the role you're adding already has a colour before you add it!

**User commands**:
`/colour-me random`:
Change your role colour to a random colour!!

`/colour-me colour <hexcode>`:
Change your role colour to a specific hex code!

`/about`:
That's this, you're reading it!

**Planned features**:
In the near future it is planned to have functionality to allow admins and optionally users to create their own coloured roles automatically.

**Links**:
Privacy Policy: https://colour-me.erisa.uk/privacy
Terms: https://colour-me.erisa.uk/tos
Support: https://discord.gg/5eTcNpqPph
[Add the bot to your server!](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=702660517617205248&permissions=268435456&scope=bot%20applications.commands)

role-error-rare: Somehow, that role doesn't exist. This error shouldn't happen so if you see it, show it off!
role-no-colour: Hey, the role <@&{{roleid}}> doesn't have a colour yet! This bot only works for coloured roles, so could you add a colour first?
error-no-permission: An error ocurred while updating the role. Do I have `Manage Roles` permission?
